named-query.query: select obj.name from XXSecurityZone obj where obj.id in (select ref.zoneId from XXSecurityZoneRefService ref where ref.serviceName = :serviceName)

named-query.name: XXSecurityZone.findByTagServiceName
named-query.query: select obj.name from XXSecurityZone obj where obj.id in (select ref.zoneId from XXSecurityZoneRefTagService ref where ref.tagServiceName = :tagServiceName)

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefGroup.findByZoneId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefGroup obj where obj.zoneId = :zoneId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefGroup.findByGroupId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefGroup obj where obj.groupId = :groupId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefGroup.findGroupTypeByZoneId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefGroup obj where obj.zoneId = :zoneId and obj.groupType = :groupType

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefResource.findByZoneId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefResource obj where obj.zoneId = :zoneId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefResource.findByResourceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefResource obj where obj.resourceDefId = :resourceDefId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefService.findByZoneId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefService obj where obj.zoneId = :zoneId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefService.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefService obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefService.findByServiceName
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefService obj where obj.serviceName = :serviceName

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefService.findByServiceNameAndZoneId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefService obj where obj.serviceName = :serviceName and obj.zoneId = :zoneId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefService.findServiceHeaderInfosByZoneId
named-query.query: SELECT obj.serviceId, obj.serviceName FROM XXSecurityZoneRefService obj WHERE obj.zoneId = :zoneId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefTagService.findByZoneId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefTagService obj where obj.zoneId = :zoneId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefTagService.findByTagServiceNameAndZoneId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefTagService obj where obj.tagServiceName = :tagServiceName and obj.zoneId = :zoneId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefTagService.findServiceHeaderInfosByZoneId
named-query.query: SELECT obj.tagServiceId, obj.tagServiceName FROM XXSecurityZoneRefTagService obj WHERE obj.zoneId = :zoneId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefUser.findByZoneId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefUser obj where obj.zoneId = :zoneId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefUser.findByUserId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefUser obj where obj.userId = :userId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZoneRefUser.findUserTypeByZoneId
named-query.query: select obj from XXSecurityZoneRefUser obj where obj.zoneId = :zoneId and obj.userType = :userType

named-query.name: XXSecurityZone.findZoneNamesByUserId
named-query.query: select distinct obj.name from XXSecurityZone obj, XXSecurityZoneRefUser refObj where obj.id = refObj.zoneId and refObj.userId = :userId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZone.findZoneNamesByGroupId
named-query.query: select distinct obj.name from XXSecurityZone obj, XXSecurityZoneRefGroup refObj where obj.id = refObj.zoneId and refObj.groupId = :groupId

named-query.name: XXSecurityZone.findAllZoneHeaderInfos
named-query.query: SELECT obj.id, obj.name FROM XXSecurityZone obj WHERE obj.id != :unzoneId

named-query.name: XXGlobalState.findByStateId
named-query.query: select obj from XXGlobalState obj where obj.id = :stateId

named-query.name: XXGlobalState.findByStateName
named-query.query: select obj from XXGlobalState obj where obj.stateName = :stateName

named-query.name: XXPolicyChangeLog.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyChangeLog obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId

named-query.name: XXPolicyChangeLog.findSinceVersion
named-query.query: select obj.id, obj.changeType, obj.policyVersion, obj.serviceType, obj.policyType, obj.policyId, obj.zoneName from XXPolicyChangeLog obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId and obj.policyVersion >= :version order by obj.policyVersion

named-query.name: XXPolicyChangeLog.findGreaterThan
named-query.query: select obj.id, obj.changeType, obj.policyVersion, obj.serviceType, obj.policyType, obj.policyId, obj.zoneName from XXPolicyChangeLog obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId and obj.serviceType = 'tag' and obj.id > :id order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXPolicyChangeLog.deleteOlderThan
named-query.query: delete from XXPolicyChangeLog obj where obj.createTime < :olderThan

named-query.name: XXRole.findByRoleId
named-query.query: select obj from XXRole obj where obj.id = :roleId

named-query.name: XXRole.findByRoleName
named-query.query: select obj from XXRole obj where obj.name = :roleName

named-query.name: XXRole.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXRole obj, XXPolicyRefRole policyRefRole, XXPolicy policy where obj.id = policyRefRole.roleId and policyRefRole.policyId = policy.id and policy.service = :serviceId

named-query.name: XXRole.findRoleNamesByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj.name from XXRole obj, XXPolicyRefRole policyRefRole, XXPolicy policy where obj.id = policyRefRole.roleId and policyRefRole.policyId = policy.id and policy.service = :serviceId

named-query.name: XXRole.getAllNames
named-query.query: select obj.name from XXRole obj

named-query.query: select obj from XXRoleRefUser obj where obj.roleId = :roleId

named-query.query: select obj from XXRoleRefUser obj where obj.userId = :userId

named-query.query: select obj from XXRoleRefUser obj where obj.userName = :userName

named-query.query: select obj from XXRoleRefGroup obj where obj.roleId = :roleId

named-query.name: XXRoleRefGroup.findByGroupId
named-query.query: select obj from XXRoleRefGroup obj where obj.groupId = :groupId

named-query.name: XXRoleRefGroup.findByGroupName
named-query.query: select obj from XXRoleRefGroup obj where obj.groupName = :groupName

named-query.name: XXRoleRefRole.findByRoleId
named-query.query: select obj from XXRoleRefRole obj where obj.roleId = :roleId

named-query.name: XXRoleRefRole.findBySubRoleId
named-query.query: select obj from XXRoleRefRole obj where obj.subRoleId = :subRoleId

named-query.name: XXRoleRefRole.findBySubRoleName
named-query.query: select obj from XXRoleRefRole obj where obj.subRoleName = :subRoleName

named-query.name: XXRoleRefRole.findRoleRefRoleCount
named-query.query: select count(obj.roleId) from XXRoleRefRole obj where obj.subRoleName = :subRoleName

named-query.name: XXPolicyRefRole.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyRefRole obj where obj.policyId = :policyId

named-query.name: XXPolicyRefRole.findIdsByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj.id from XXPolicyRefRole obj where obj.policyId = :policyId

named-query.name: XXPolicyRefRole.findByRoleName
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyRefRole obj where obj.roleName = :roleName

named-query.name: XXPolicyRefRole.findUpdatedRoleNamesByPolicy
named-query.query: select roleRef.policyId, roleRef.roleName, role.name from XXPolicyRefRole roleRef, XXRole role where roleRef.policyId = :policy and roleRef.roleId = role.id and roleRef.roleName != role.name

named-query.name: XXPolicyRefRole.findUpdatedRoleNamesByService
named-query.query: select roleRef.policyId, roleRef.roleName, role.name from XXPolicy policy, XXPolicyRefRole roleRef, XXRole role where policy.service = :service and roleRef.policyId = policy.id and roleRef.roleId = role.id and roleRef.roleName != role.name

named-query.name: XXPolicyRefRole.findRoleRefPolicyCount
named-query.query: select count(obj.policyId) from XXPolicyRefRole obj where obj.roleName = :roleName

named-query.name: XXPolicyRefRole.deleteByIds
named-query.query: DELETE FROM XXPolicyRefRole obj WHERE obj.id IN :ids

named-query.name: XXTagChangeLog.findSinceVersion
named-query.query: select obj.id, obj.changeType, obj.serviceTagsVersion, obj.serviceResourceId, obj.tagId from XXTagChangeLog obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId and obj.serviceTagsVersion >= :version order by obj.serviceTagsVersion

named-query.name: XXTagChangeLog.deleteOlderThan
named-query.query: delete from XXTagChangeLog obj where obj.createTime < :olderThan

named-query.name: XXRMSResourceMapping.deleteByHlResourceId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM XXRMSResourceMapping obj WHERE obj.hlResourceId = :resourceId

named-query.name: XXRMSResourceMapping.deleteByLlResourceId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM XXRMSResourceMapping obj WHERE obj.llResourceId = :resourceId

named-query.name: XXRMSResourceMapping.findByHlAndLlResourceId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXRMSResourceMapping obj WHERE obj.hlResourceId = :hlResourceId and obj.llResourceId = :llResourceId

named-query.name: XXRMSResourceMapping.deleteByHlAndLlResourceId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM XXRMSResourceMapping obj WHERE obj.hlResourceId = :hlResourceId and obj.llResourceId = :llResourceId

named-query.name: XXRMSResourceMapping.deleteByLlOrHlResourceId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM XXRMSResourceMapping obj WHERE obj.hlResourceId = :resourceId or obj.llResourceId = :resourceId

named-query.name: XXRMSResourceMapping.findByHlResourceId
named-query.query: SELECT obj.llResourceId FROM XXRMSResourceMapping obj WHERE obj.hlResourceId = :hlResourceId

named-query.name: XXRMSResourceMapping.findByLlResourceId
named-query.query: SELECT obj.hlResourceId FROM XXRMSResourceMapping obj WHERE obj.llResourceId = :llResourceId

named-query.name: XXRMSResourceMapping.getServiceResourcesByLlResourceId
named-query.query: SELECT obj.id, obj.guid, obj.version, obj.isEnabled, obj.resourceSignature, obj.serviceId, obj.serviceResourceElements FROM XXRMSServiceResource obj where obj.id in (select mapping.hlResourceId FROM XXRMSResourceMapping mapping WHERE mapping.llResourceId = :llResourceId)

named-query.name: XXRMSResourceMapping.deleteByServiceId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM XXRMSResourceMapping mapping WHERE mapping.hlResourceId in (select obj.id from XXRMSServiceResource obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId) OR mapping.llResourceId in (select obj.id from XXRMSServiceResource obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId)

named-query.name: XXRMSNotification.getMaxIdOfNotifications
named-query.query: select max(obj.notificationId) from XXRMSNotification obj where obj.llServiceId = :llServiceId and obj.hlServiceId = :hlServiceId

named-query.name: XXRMSNotification.getAllAfterNotificationId
named-query.query: select obj from XXRMSNotification obj where obj.llServiceId = :llServiceId and obj.hlServiceId = :hlServiceId and obj.notificationId > :notificationId order by obj.notificationId

named-query.name: XXRMSNotification.getNotificationWithTypeAfterNotificationId
named-query.query: select obj from XXRMSNotification obj where obj.changeType = :changeType and obj.llServiceId = :llServiceId and obj.hlServiceId = :hlServiceId and obj.notificationId > :notificationId order by obj.notificationId

named-query.name: XXRMSNotification.getDeletedNotificationsByHlResourceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXRMSNotification obj where obj.changeType = 'delete' and obj.hlResourceId = :hlResourceId and obj.notificationId > :lastKnownVersion order by obj.notificationId

named-query.name: XXRMSNotification.deleteByServiceId
named-query.query: DELETE from XXRMSNotification obj where obj.llServiceId = :serviceId or obj.hlServiceId = :serviceId

named-query.name: XXRMSServiceResource.getLlResourceIdForHlResourceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXRMSServiceResource obj, XXRMSNotification notification where obj.id = notification.llResourceId and notification.changeType = 'add' and notification.hlResourceId = :hlResourceId and notification.notificationId > :lastKnownIndex

named-query.name: XXRMSServiceResource.findByServiceId
named-query.query: SELECT obj.id, obj.guid, obj.version, obj.isEnabled, obj.resourceSignature, obj.serviceId, obj.serviceResourceElements FROM XXRMSServiceResource obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXRMSServiceResource.getByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj.id from XXRMSServiceResource obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXRMSServiceResource.deleteByServiceId
named-query.query: delete from XXRMSServiceResource obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId

named-query.name: XXRMSServiceResource.findByServiceAndResourceSignature
named-query.query: select obj from XXRMSServiceResource obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId and obj.resourceSignature = :resourceSignature

named-query.name: XXRMSServiceResource.deleteById
named-query.query: DELETE FROM XXRMSServiceResource obj WHERE obj.id = :resourceId

named-query.name: XXRMSMappingProvider.findByName
named-query.query: select obj from XXRMSMappingProvider obj where obj.name = :name

named-query.name: XXRole.findByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXRole obj WHERE obj.id IN (SELECT roleRefUser.roleId FROM XXRoleRefUser roleRefUser WHERE roleRefUser.userId = :userId) OR obj.id IN (SELECT roleRefGroup.roleId FROM XXRoleRefGroup roleRefGroup WHERE roleRefGroup.groupId IN (SELECT groupUser.parentGroupId FROM XXGroupUser groupUser WHERE groupUser.userId = :userId)) order by obj.id
